audio_get_type: When adding audio to GameMaker Studio 2 it can be either streamed or in memory. If you need to know whether a given sound index is for streamed audio or not you can use this function which will return 1 for streamed, 0 for sound in memory, and -1 if there is any error or the index does not point to a valid sound resource.
The index of the sound to check.
The above code checks the type of audio indexed in the variable "snd_Music_1" and stores the returned value in the variable "type".
